name: The Apocalypse Constructor
description:
The zombie apocalypse has begin. Try to build defense for your home using powerful tower and structure but make sure you provide enough energy for them.

The instruction will provide more details of the game.

Keybinds: (Can change in settings)

Open Craft
CUse Item
Left Click
Flip Structure
FOpen Structure Details
Left Click
Upgrade Structure
ASell Structure
BOpen Crafting Panel
CSpeed Up Game 4x
QInventory Slot (Can't change)
1, 2, ..., 9, 0

It is recommend to use windows version if you experience lag in web version.
